quadrant1.name: Urgent & Important
quadrant1.description: Crises, deadlines, things that must be handled immediately
activities: Clean up after a water leak or spill
Cook dinner because the family needs to eat now
Wash dishes when there are none left for the next meal
Emergency grocery run due to no food at home
Fix a broken appliance essential for daily life
Take out overflowing trash
Handle a sudden pest problem

quadrant2.name: Not Urgent & Important
activities: Weekly meal planning
Regular house cleaning schedule
Organizing cupboards and storage areas
Preventive home maintenance
Batch cooking meals for the week
Decluttering unused items
Creating a household budget
Teaching children household routines
Deep cleaning bathrooms and kitchen appliances

quadrant3.name: Urgent & Not Important
activities: Cleaning the house suddenly because guests might arrive
Re-cleaning already clean areas unnecessarily
Cooking an elaborate meal due to social pressure
Responding immediately to non-essential household messages
Impulsively rearranging furniture
Running errands that feel urgent but could wait

quadrant4.name: Not Urgent & Not Important
activities: Excessive TV watching instead of doing chores
Endless scrolling on the phone
Re-organizing the same drawer repeatedly
Playing games while chores pile up
Researching cleaning methods instead of cleaning
Over-shopping for unnecessary household items
